name: Super Bit Brawls
description:
Super Bit Brawls is a 2D Arena Fighter.

It is currently 2 player with a controller needed for at least one player. Later versions will support 4 players and I'm tossing around the idea of 6 or 8 player modes.

This is a very early beta demo just showing the basic features and gameplay loop.
Last one alive gets a point, 5 points to win.

There is currently 3 weapons and 10 levels, I plan to add a huge number of weapons and levels, with possibly a level creator as well.

I also plan to integrate NFT's, first as character skins then maybe some other cosmetic stuff as well.

(There is no audio yet)

Controls

Menu

P1 Only
Start = Start
A = Select
D-Pad = Move Selection
E = Toggle Keyboard for P1

In-Game

Keyboard (If P1 Keyboard Switch is On)
Arrows = Movement
Space = Jump
Z = Interact/Shoot
X = Drop Weapon
C = Cancel (Unused In-game currently)

Controller
Left Joystick or D-Pad - Movement
A = Jump
X = Interact/Shoot
Y = Drop Weapon
B = Cancel (Unused In-game currently)
